comments: Simple continued fraction is A081750. - _Michael Somos_, May 07 2012Equals sum_{n>=1} n^2/n!. - _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Mar 11 2013Equals lim_{x->1} (x*e^x - e)/(x-1).  Also 2e = sum_{n>=0} sum_{k=0..n} 1/n!. - _Richard R. Forberg_, Dec 23 2014
